main event: Mr. Hall of Hamlet, Indiana found a clear shaped object approximately 6 ft long and 3 ft wide, made of aluminum and steel, which contained radio equipment.
interesting points: The investigation revealed the object to be a hoax made by a 16-year-old boy., The object was initially reported as an unidentified flying object., The report suggests a clear investigation by OSI and FBI., There was a total of 1 object observed during the incident., The report mentions the object was made of aluminum and steel.
sighted object: clear shaped object containing radio equipment
